attributes.action: Ban Donald J Trump entry to the UK until he gets rid of the US's Immigrant Ban.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the actions of Donald J Trump to be Anti-Human.
attributes.background:
I think this is best summed up by, Olympic Athlete Mo Farah:
https://www.facebook.com/MoFarahGold/posts/1369028299785195
We should set a precedent around the world to show that this immigration ban is just not acceptable and all countries, in my opinion should do the same.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179425
